titleStmt.title: A Letter from the officers at Whitehall to the officers under Generall Monck in Scotland with the answer of Generall Monck and his officers thereunto : wherein with plainness and sinceritie, they endeavour to set before them the evil of their doings.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Edinburgh by Christopher Higgins ... and reprinted in London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
